caption: A woman is smoking, sitting on a sofa next to a man in black clothing. On the street, a man stands with a row of cars in front of him. Another man's hands are bound, with bloodstains on his clothes. A woman is in front of him. Then, another man in white arrives and lights a cigarette for the bound man. A group of men descends from the car and takes the people from the scene. In a restaurant, a group of people gathers around a round table with many glasses in front of them. At night, a group of people appears near a car. Another group dines in the restaurant, and yet another group chats in the study.
